title: Centre dissolves panel on statistics, surveys amid delayed Census
selftext: Panel being dismantled as its work overlaps with a newer steering committee for the National Sample Surveys, says NSSO Director-General; panel head Pronab Sen says members had flagged delay in the census, last conducted in 2011, in every meeting
